A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Really bad writing\, poor characters and misplaced attempts at humour. This film is Rian Johnson's own work of fan fiction except one thing is clear from this film and his response to the intelligent fans - he is not a fan of Star Wars\, no supposed fan would cut Luke's balls off. Just a note he also used a non-canon book to justify the long distance Jedi phone call \, what a tool.
